entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:41 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:41 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:41 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
